etymology.interpretation: The character 又 symbolizes a depiction of a right hand. This intuitive image connects to its meaning of 'hand,' emphasizing the hand's role in various actions.

examples.chinese: 又要下雨了(又要下雨了)。
examples.pinyin: yòu yào xià yǔ le(又要下雨了)。
examples.english: It's going to rain again(又要下雨了)。

examples.pinyin: tā yòu lái le(他又來了)。
examples.english: He is here again(他又來了)。

examples.chinese: 这个问题又复杂了(這個問題又複雜了)。
examples.pinyin: zhè ge wèn tí yòu fù zá le(這個問題又複雜了)。
examples.english: This problem has gotten complicated again(這個問題又複雜了)。
